message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.DB, cs.SE

This paper discusses a novel blockchain relay scheme that enables the verification of data across blockchains while remaining fully decentralized. The paper focuses on the security and efficiency aspects of the proposed scheme, which suggests that it belongs to the category of Cryptography and Security (cs.CR). The scheme also involves the on-chain execution of Simplified Payment Verifications, which suggests that it may also belong to the categories of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC), Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS), Databases (cs.DB), and Software Engineering (cs.SE).
